TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and is currently serving his prison sentence in LOC .

CARDINAL . NORP In the operative part of a judgment , a trial court shall inform of the manner and the time - limit for lodging an appeal . Furthermore , it shall explain that a convicted or acquitted person has a right to ask that his or her participation in an appeal hearing be ensured ( LAW ) .
CARDINAL . If a convicted person wishes to take part in an appeal hearing , he or she shall indicate this in the statement of appeal ( Article CARDINAL § CARDINAL ) .
CARDINAL . The parties shall be notified of the date , time and venue of an appeal hearing DATE in advance ( LAW ) .

CARDINAL . A convicted person , who is held in custody and has expressed the wish to be present at the appeal hearing , shall be entitled to participate in the court session either directly or by video link ( LAW ) .

CARDINAL . At the hearing , the appeal court shall hear the statement of the appellant and the objection by the opposing party . The appeal court shall be empowered to examine evidence and additional materials provided by the parties in support of their arguments ( Article CARDINAL ) .
